data.text: @2legit2trip You got to use your Brain 🧠 and to make it think properly. For urgency need, if you donâ€™t convert any ready private hospital to treat Covid patient do you have a better plan ? Or you prefer Main China to help you build a temporary one within 10 days?
@2legit2trip I thought it was a Russian attack alert to HKers. Crazy of the HK govt to abuse this alert to notify all citizens of such an unimportant message
